original_title: Shaun the Sheep: The Farmer's Llamas
overview: In The Farmer's Llamas the wily sheep bluffs his dim-witted farmer master into bidding for three llamas at a county fair. Once they show up at the farm, however, they cause such chaotic destructive mayhem that Shaun has to carefully remove them â€“ high speed chases, careful rooftop scrambles and dangerous falls ensue.
title: Shaun the Sheep: The Farmer's Llamas
